channel.title: Lightweight on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Lightweight on Arrans github.io

item.title: armbian/build
item.description: The official build framework for the Armbian Linux distribution. This repository contains the complete toolchain and scripts required to compile custom OS images from source, including kernel configuration, U-Boot handling, and board-specific tweaks for various ARM and ARM64 single-board computers.

item.title: spotify/basic-pitch
item.description: A lightweight yet powerful audio-to-MIDI converter with pitch bend detection

item.title: clidey/whodb
item.description: A lightweight next-gen data explorer - Postgres, MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB, Redis, MariaDB, Elastic Search, and Clickhouse with Chat interface

item.title: mrmn2/PdfDing
item.description: Selfhosted PDF manager, viewer and editor offering a seamless user experience on multiple devices.
